text: Hi everyone - I need to track HubSpot CMS sites with Google Analytics. In order to have some sanity in my data, I want to clean the URL parameters from my reports. Is there anywhere a full list of parameters and their interpretation?

hello, just wondering, im making a 404 page in HubSpot for landing pages and is it possible to add a search field that shows search content from the main wordpress website of our company and then upon search it redirects from the main website's search page?

Hey <@UDFSF3N1F> we shouldn't be putting any of our pop-up forms HTML within an iframe as far as I'm aware. What sections specifically were you seeing within an iframe?
The only forms we should render within an iframe are theme'd regular forms.

This happened sometime in April this year where we were trying to change the color of some placeholder text in a popup form. I got an email from a coworker (I'm re-reading it just so I know I didn't miss something) that said we couldn't because the the form was loaded in an iframe. I'm checking that form now though and there isn't a iframe anymore, which matches what you're saying
Good to know! Thanks for the update Patrick! :thumbsup:

If you haven't already <@UHFNPGKT5> - this would be a good question to cross-post in the Reporting & Analytics forum: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Reporting-Analytics/bd-p/marketing_reports>

You can also search the forum to see if someone already asked/answered this one.
